snippet: Dish Network, a satellite television provider, has urged regulators to reject two large deals between its rivals that, if approved, would reshape the country’s television and broadband markets.
lead_paragraph: Dish Network, a satellite television provider, has urged regulators to reject two large deals between its rivals that, if approved, would reshape the country’s television and broadband markets.

headline.main: Dish Tells F.C.C. That Mergers Pose ‘Competitive Concerns’
headline.print_headline: Dish Tells F.C.C. That Mergers Pose ‘competitive Concerns’
